node.name: Stlipse

category.name: Web, XML, Java EE and OSGi Enterprise Development

node.shortdescription:
Stlipse is a Stripes plugin for Eclipse.

[Features]

Content assist and validation in JSP editor

  • 'beanclass' attribute of any tag.
  • ActionBean properties and event name for Stripes tags.

Content assist and validation in Java editor.

  • 'field' attribute of @Validate annotation.
  • 'allow' and 'deny' attributes of @StrictBinding annotation.

Miscellaneous features

  • Allow Quick Fix to create the missing ActionBean directly from JSP editor.
  • Hyperlink for tag attribute value to open the ActionBean.
node.body:
Stlipse is a Stripes plugin for Eclipse.

[Features]

Content assist and validation in JSP editor

  • 'beanclass' attribute of any tag.
  • ActionBean properties and event name for Stripes tags.

Content assist and validation in Java editor.

  • 'field' attribute of @Validate annotation.
  • 'allow' and 'deny' attributes of @StrictBinding annotation.

Miscellaneous features

  • Allow Quick Fix to create the missing ActionBean directly from JSP editor.
  • Hyperlink for tag attribute value to open the ActionBean.
